address: via delle Sette Chiese 1, loc. Pinzago
description: Situated in a panoramic location a few kilometres outside Bressanone, this simple yet modern restaurant serves regional, classically prepared cuisine with an equally simple, contemporary feel plus a few dishes with the occasional Mediterranean influence. There are also elegant apartments available, plus a wellness space, for anyone wishing to extend their stay.
